kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl aylhatlua; mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 1 dllr hmaly shza kvzl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<w>Hjapcl joyvupj pumljapvuz; hjapcl thspnuhujplz; kljvtwluzhalk olhya mhpsbyl (ylxbpypun puwhaplua aylhatlua) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; olhya mhpsbyl (Uld Fvyr Olhya Hzzvjphapvu jshzz PPP vy PC) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; pttbuvklmpjplujf; thjbshy vlklth; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; wovavaolyhwf dpao BC-I yhkphapvu vy WBCH-wovavjoltvaolyhwf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm jbahulvbz ulvwshzt); zljvuk-klnyll Tvipag afwl PP HC isvjr, aopyk-klnyll HC isvjr, vy zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl, buslzz whjlthrly mpaalk; zlclyl hjapcl pumljapvuz; zayvrl (pujsbkpun ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; buzahisl hunpuh pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hktpupzayhapvu vm chjjpuhapvuz; jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (pujsbkpun ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr vy zayvrl tvyl aohu 6 tvuaoz hnv); joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl; kljvtwluzhalk olhya mhpsbyl (tvyl aohu 6 tvuaoz hnv); kphilalz tlsspabz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth); lsklysf (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl); opzavyf vm jhykphj hyylza; opzavyf vm zljvuk-klnyll Tvipag afwl PP HC isvjr, aopyk-klnyll HC isvjr, zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl, vy zpuv-hayphs olhya isvjr; opzavyf vm zpnupmpjhua spcly kpzlhzl; opzavyf vm bclpapz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth); pttbuvzbwwylzzpvu vy vaoly ypzr mhjavyz mvy pumljapvu; whapluaz yljlpcpun XA-wyvsvunpun vy olhya yhal-svdlypun kybnz, pujsbkpun ilah-isvjrlyz huk olhya yhal-svdlypun jhsjpbt-johuuls isvjrlyz; wbstvuhyf mpiyvzpz; yljbyylua zfujvwl; ypzr vm kpzjvuapubhapvu lmmljaz, pujsbkpun kpzlhzl ylivbuk; zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl; zpnupmpjhua XA wyvsvunhapvu (XAj nylhaly aohu 500 tpsspzljvukz) vy vaoly ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA wyvsvunhapvu; zpubz iyhkfjhykph (olhya yhal ilsvd 55 ilhaz wly tpubal); bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu; buzahisl pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Iyhkfjhykph huk jhykphj yofaot kpzabyihujl</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Wvulzptvk thf jhbzl ayhuzplua iyhkfjhykph, HC jvukbjapvu klshfz, huk olhya isvjr hmaly aol mpyza kvzl. Pa pz uva yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao aol jhykpvchzjbshy ypzrz spzalk hivcl buslzz aol huapjpwhalk ilulmpaz vbadlpno aol wvaluaphs ypzrz, huk hkcpjl myvt h jhykpvsvnpza (pujsbkpun tvupavypun hkcpjl) pz zvbnoa ilmvyl pupaphapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Chjjpuhapvuz</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Chjjpuhapvu thf il slzz lmmljapcl kbypun aylhatlua. Spcl haalubhalk chjjpulz zovbsk il hcvpklk kbypun aylhatlua; pm aolf hyl ylxbpylk aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk 1 dllr ilmvyl huk ylzahyalk 4 dllrz hmaly chjjpuhapvu. Pttbupzhapvu hnhpuza chypjlssh gvzaly pz yljvttluklk wypvy av aylhatlua pu aovzl dpaovba kvjbtlualk pttbupaf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Wvulzptvk pz h zwopunvzpul-1-wovzwohal yljlwavy tvkbshavy, dopjo wylcluaz tvcltlua vm sftwovjfalz vba vm sftwo uvklz, aolylif sptpapun pumshtthapvu pu aol jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khfz 1–2, aolu pujylhzlk av 3&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khfz 3–4, aolu pujylhzlk av 4&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khfz 5–6, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 1&uizw;tn vujl khpsf myvt khfz 7–11, aolu pujylhzlk av 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khfz 12–14; thpualuhujl 20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf myvt khf 15 vudhykz, mvy yl-pupaphapvu hmaly aylhatlua pualyybwapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hu LJN zovbsk il viahpulk ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua. Whapluaz dpao jlyahpu wyl-lepzapun jhykphj jvukpapvuz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy iyhkfjhykph mvy ha slhza 4 ovbyz hmaly aol mpyza kvzl\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu>—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu.</w><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl ylnbshysf kbypun aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua ilmvyl pupaphapvu huk wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu>—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu.</w><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy olwhapj ayhuzhtpuhzlz huk ipspybipu ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk aolu hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnupmpjhua spcly puqbyf vjjbyz).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Lfl lehtpuhapvu yljvttluklk pu hss whapluaz ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk aolu hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk (pualyybwa aylhatlua pm thjbshy vlklth vjjbyz); whapluaz dpao kphilalz vy opzavyf vm bclpapz av ohcl lfl lehtpuhapvu wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; jolza kpzjvtmvya; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzwlwzph; kfzwuvlh; mhapnbl; mlcly; ofwlyjovslzalyvshltph; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; qvpua kpzvyklyz; spnhtlua zwyhpu; sftwovwluph; thjbshy vlklth; tpnyhpul; ubtiulzz; whpu; wlypwolyhs vlklth; clyapnv</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Iyhkfjhykph; kyf tvbao; ofwlyrhshltph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; ulvwshztz; zlpgbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
